name: Take your time (annairda)
description:
Take your time

It's a game about not rushing anything. You can take your time to win this level. You can retake as many times as you want. I tried this to be peaceful and comforting, but I know it can be frustrating. For those who iritate quickly, it can be an opportunity to realize, that is just a game and it does not have to make impact on your feelings. Take your time and have fun. Or not.
